documentation.text: @notice Validate that encoded `relayCall` is properly packed without any extra bytes
@notice Validate that encoded `relayCall` is properly packed without any extra bytes

userdoc.notice: Validates the `msg.data` received by the `RelayHub` does not contain unnecessary bytes. Including these extra bytes would allow the Relay Server to inflate transaction costs and overcharge the client.
